name: Yellow Wumpy
description: A cheerfully yellow creature bounces here with the manic energy of someone who has consumed their body weight in sugar. Its smile is wide, unwavering, and just a touch unsettling in its permanence.
dialogue: The Yellow Wumpy vibrates with barely contained enthusiasm!
Hi! HI! Are you gonna kick me? That sounds FUN!
The Yellow Wumpy does a little dance that defies several laws of physics.

messages: The wumpy goes sailing through the air with a satisfying *thwump* sound!
The wumpy looks hurt and confused.
With a sad 'wump', it waddles away and disappears into the distance.
